values:
....If there is one person you can't stop thinking about, post this same exact sentence in your journal.


YES MAdam I think of you constantly.  

And I didn't think that you were cheating on me.  I was just surprised that you said everything was a lie even if it was a joke.  I am sorry that you took it that way.  I already knew you were in the CIA/FBI anyways you crazy beanpod.
http://crimson-court.livejournal.com/6662.html
Four days until Nelle!  I can't wait.
http://crimson-court.livejournal.com/6611.html
I MISS MY SWEET PEA.  I WANT TO BE WITH HER SO BADLY.  I WISH VIRGINIA AND MASSACHUSETTS WERE CONNECTED.
http://crimson-court.livejournal.com/6315.html
Sorry about last night everybody, I will be ok.  I appreciate the support
http://crimson-court.livejournal.com/5698.html

Everytime I am busy for a little while it appears.  It is as if it waits for the most opportune moment when the seagull is lost in the fog.  Then I come back from looking back for a moments time and it is there, distracting the seagull.  I feel like whenever I leave it waits to steal the seagull away.  Thank you my romeo, for my lovesick juliet is waiting for the poison.
http://crimson-court.livejournal.com/5389.html

Thank you James for being my friend.

On another subject: Hurray! I jump like the arrested man after the baseball game in Colorado.  that was for you Danelle.

I built star wars lego's yesterday.
http://crimson-court.livejournal.com/5197.html
I dont know why I act like I do to the people I love.  I am sorry for being such a negative nancy.  I will work on not being such a prick.
http://crimson-court.livejournal.com/4694.html
Im going to do it soon.  Just fucking wait, then everyone can sit in their fucking shells and have something else to be paranoid about.
http://crimson-court.livejournal.com/4554.html

It is strange how things come and go so fast.  Everyday I wake up and wonder what else is going to be different.  Who will be gone?  It is a sad thing when news is brought to you from best friends about change.  I feel I need to be home for them and so I will return shortly, for life is ever changing and I don't want to be the change I speak of.  I don't want to be wiped off of the board.
http://crimson-court.livejournal.com/4168.html
What does it mean to have three of them in your head when two want the other dead?  It is common amoung us and it will never leave for the one will strike back
http://crimson-court.livejournal.com/3888.html
I have not been on my computer for a while so it has taken a while to update.    I am back at school and i love apple pie.
http://crimson-court.livejournal.com/3653.html

I havn't updated in a while cause I have been trying to get everything finished to get ready for finals. One week from today bob will return home and get ready for band practice galore!!! I havn't done any christmas shopping yet so I am gonna have to haul ass and get some shit done. I don't have to much to say except for YARgybloth! I dont know what that means.  O well.  

                     This is B. checking oUt.-----later days-----
http://crimson-court.livejournal.com/3500.html

So if anyone read my journal entry the other day it talked about me walking in on the roomy and stuff.  Well last night Danelle slept over because I pretty much begged her to, even though she had a lot of work to do.  As we were sleeping my drunk roomate and his girlfriend were sleeping and they decided why not get fiesty right in front of us.  Danelle woke up to roomy railing his girlfriend completely naked and exposed.  Then I woke up and almost threw up because of what happened.  So at four in the morning when they had finished we applauded them for there good show and how grateful we were for it and decided to sleep in Danelle's room.  This is why Umaine is not that enjoyable.  This kind of shit happens all of the time.  O well at least I dont have to worry about walking in on them if they feel comftorable just fucking right in front of me. yayaya

                              This is B. checking oUt.-----later days-----

Friday is finally here, yayay.  I am going snowboarding tommorow at Sugarloaf with a couple of kids from school, it should be pretty fun.  I am sitting around for a little while until the hockey game tonight.  Maine vs. Merrimack.  After that I will prob hang out with Danelle for a little while and then go to bed.  I am pretty excited that the semester is almost over.  I just want to get these credits under my belt so I don't have to worry as much.  I know it sounds dumb but that is just how I am (NERD).  I ate some really delicious crackers a little while ago.  


                             This is B. Signing oUt.----later days-----

(p.s.     I LOVE DANELLE_____________SOOOOOOOOOOOO MUCH)                                             ..more
http://crimson-court.livejournal.com/2727.html

Yesterday I went to ride my bike and found that someone had smashed my back tire and that it was unridable.  That kind of sucked and I am pretty sure it was the douchebags that live next to me that did it.  I went to the campus police and filed a report with Danelle and then the officer went to their room.  I don't know what happened because I was going to Bangor with the girly.  I also would like to one little thing to Danelle-------MAXIM--------------     OYa.  Shast is nice.  I am not going to get into detail about that, and trust me when I say you don't want me to.  I have to go to class now and play with my nostrils to keep myself entertained.         I love Pea.

                        This is B. Checking oUt-----later days-----

I almost flipped a bitch within the last 12 hours.  How strange they were.  I walked in on the roomy having sex- not fun at all, not fun by any means.  Then I get in a fight with one of my best friends which really sucked, but we will def work shast out.  Then I went to bed but I couldn't fall asleep until 4 oclock in the morning.  I then woke up with puffs under my eyes and went to physics recitation which I did not understand a word of, and I have a test on it tommorow which really sucks donkey balls.  Then I went to Computer Design and fucked up every possible thing that I could so I had to stay a half hour longer than everyone else.  (two more classes and I finish that fucking course).  Now I am cooling off and about to go to lunch with Danelle.  I am listening to The Who Ultimate Collection that I got from Evan, it fucking rocks.  I love The Who.     I WANT BAND PRACTICE NOW!!!!!!!!!!        

                                       This is B. checking out-----Later Days-----
http://crimson-court.livejournal.com/1718.html

Lets play a game called I don't give a fuck anymore.  I think I might just do that.  Here is how we play:

                      1) you bitch at me
                      2) I don't give a fuck

So quit your goddam fucking whining and suck shit up cause nobody gives a fuck, especially me.
http://crimson-court.livejournal.com/1347.html

I just ate some amazing cranberry bread and I am about to drink some V8 juice.  Something about V8 is disgusting, yet it is satisfying at the same time.  
  I went to my Prof. today to ask him about the homework and then halfway through he stops and says o shast (not his exact words, but you get the point) and realizes that he gave us a problem a lot harder than he wanted to, but then figured he would make us do it anyways.  I love when he does that, I get so fucking excited!
  I got a lot of sleep last night which was awesome and I think a few more nights like that and I will be feeling real good again soon.  

                            This is B. Signing oUt----Later Days----
http://crimson-court.livejournal.com/1106.html

I find myself getting really tired earlier than normal again which kind of sucks.  I really want to be completely over Mono so I can do some normal things again.  I can for the most part, but I can't do any contact sports or work out, not that I do that anyways, but I feel very limited.  A few weeks and I am finished for the semester, I just don't want to get lazy quite yet (though I feel the slackage coming on). 

   I have to think about buying christmas presents for people soon. I don't really know what to get anyone so if you have random ideas feel free to throw them at me so I can get the ball rolling.  I think I am going to go to bed so I can relax for a bit. Yarggggggggggggggggggggggggggggggggg. 


                                 This is B. Checking OUt. -----Later Days-----
